spec_data.Name: perl-HTML-CalendarMonthSimple
spec_data.Description:
HTML::CalendarMonthSimple is a Perl module for generating, manipulating,
and printing a HTML calendar grid for a specified month. It is intended as
a faster and easier-to-use alternative to HTML::CalendarMonth.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:07:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl Module for Generating HTML Calendars
